name: Scope
text:
ARTICLE 10D
LIFE INSURANCE AND ANNUITIES

Cross References
  Civil relief for state military forces, see chapter 657D.
  Risk-based capital for insurers, see §§431:3-401 to 414.
PART I.  INDIVIDUAL LIFE INSURANCE, ANNUITIES
AND PURE ENDOWMENT CONTRACTS
 §431:10D-101    This part applies to contracts of life insurance and annuities other than group life insurance, group annuities and except as provided in section 431:10D-302, other than industrial life insurance. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2]
